name: Rym 9000
description: Rym 9000 is a hyperkinetic shooter inspired by Akira, Neon Genesis Evangelion, and Guxt. A treasure-hunting journey to the Moon developed by Sonoshee and composed by Roex. A unique high-octane experience conceived to stimulate your senses and make your eyes and ears bleed!
minimum_requirements: 最低: OS: Windows XP SP2 or higher プロセッサー: 2Ghz+ メモリー: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c ストレージ: 390 MB 利用可能
